sen.j: 天道は日本における太陽神。
sen.e: Tento is the sun god in Japan.
sen.cmt: 原文が、2行にわかれていたので１行にしました。
sen.e: Tento is the sun god in Japan.
Tento is the sun god in Japan.
Described in the paragraph.
Described in this paragraph.
sen.cmt: the を this に修正しました。
sen.e: Described in this paragraph.
Heaven (Buddhism)
Heaven (Buddhism)
Heaven (Buddhism)

sen.j: 六道の1つで、神々や天人が住む世界。
sen.e: One of rokudo (six posthumous worlds), the world where gods and tennin (heavenly beings) live.
It is one of rokudo (six posthumous worlds), the world where gods and tennin (heavenly beings) live.
sen.cmt: It is を追記しました。
sen.e: It is one of rokudo (six posthumous worlds), the world where gods and tennin (heavenly beings) live.
Tento Station.
Tento Station.
Tento Station.
Name of the station.
It is a name of a station.
It is a name of a station.
Tendo (new religion).
Tendo (new religion).
Tendo (new religion).

sen.j: および同宗教における理念。
sen.e: And the philosophy of the religion.
And the philosophy of the religion.
And the philosophy of the religion.

sen.j: 天道（てんとう）は日本における太陽神。
sen.e: Tento is the sun god in Japan.
Tento is the sun god in Japan.
Tento is the sun god in Japan.
The sun.
The sun.
The sun.
The sun disk.
The sun disk.
The sun disk.
"Oh-sama."
"Oh-sama."
"Oh-sama."

sen.j: 信仰心が伴わない場合でも太陽をお日様と呼ぶことがある。
sen.e: The sun is called as ohi-sama even if religious faith does not exist.
The sun is called "ohi-sama" even without religious faith.
The sun is called "ohi-sama" even without religious faith.

sen.j: これ以外にもお月様、お星様という言葉がある。
sen.e: Other than this word, the words, otuki-sama (moon) and ohoshi-sama (stars), exist.
Other than this word, there are words of otsuki-sama (moon) and ohoshi-sama (stars).
Other than this word, there are words of otsuki-sama (moon) and ohoshi-sama (stars).

sen.j: 一般的にお天道様（おてんとさま）とも言うように太陽を神として祀られる。
sen.e: Called as otento-sama generally, the sun is enshrined as a god.
Called as otento-sama generally, the sun is enshrined as a god.
Called as otento-sama generally, the sun is enshrined as a god.

sen.j: また天童信仰においては日の神の子として天童（てんどう）という言葉もある。
sen.e: Furthermore, in tendo belief, there is a word, tendo, which means a child of hi no kami (the sun goddess i.e. Amaterasu Omikami) too.
Furthermore, in tendo belief, there is a word, tendo, which means a child of hi no kami (the sun goddess i.e. Amaterasu Omikami) too.
Furthermore, in tendo belief, there is a word, tendo, which means a child of hi no kami (the sun goddess i.e. Amaterasu Omikami) too.

sen.j: てんとうむし（天道虫）なども一般的。
sen.e: A ladybird (tento-mushi) is also common.
A ladybird (tento-mushi) is also common.
A ladybird (tento-mushi) is also common.

sen.j: 地名では、名古屋市天白区天道、福岡県飯塚市天道、鹿児島県出水郡長島町の天道山などがある。
sen.e: For place names, there are Tendo, Tenpaku Ward, Nagoya City; Tendo, Iizuka City, Fukuoka Prefecture; and Mt. Tendo in Nagashima-cho, Izumi County, Kagoshima Prefecture, etc.
For place names, there are Tendo, Tenpaku Ward, Nagoya City; Tendo, Iizuka City, Fukuoka Prefecture; and Mt. Tendo in Nagashima-cho, Izumi County, Kagoshima Prefecture, etc.
